modName: Little bit of everything in one mod
descriptionHtml:
Masters files need are:
Skyrim.esm
Update.esm
Dragonborn.esm
Hearthfires.esm
Dawnguard.esm

Should work with most other mods.
Have not with to many other mods, this is my first uploaded mod so have fun.

Reanimate Thrall single handed spell sold at these locations. Basically the same as Dread Thrall but without the two handed spell.
Phinis Gestor (Conjuration) --  College of Winterhold 
Talvas Fathryon -- Tel Mithryn , Solsteim if you have Dragonborn DLC.
For quick adding goto console and type (help reanimate thrall) and put that code behind player.additem XXXXXXXX # and that should give you
the Tome for the spell.

Slow Time Ring
Slows time to a crawl when worn. good for hotkeying during battles.
On Body of Gunjar at beginning of game. If added mod in middle of game you can goto console and type (help slow time ring) and put that code
behind player.additem XXXXXXXX # and that should give it to you.


Changed Twin Souls Perk name to More Souls Perk with 10 tiers to allow up to 10 reanimate bodies.
Also can reanimate all dead actors regardless of type of actor. Does not work on dragons yet.
Reanimated Actors no longer turn to ash when they die now allowing continued reanimation.

Advanced Armors Perk added 8 new perk tiers to allow up to 10x better tempered Armors and now Weapons are Tempered higher as well.

Extra pockets Perk add 8 new perk tiers to allo up to 50000 carryweight through normal play without console commands.

Runemaster Perk add 8 new perk tiers to allow up to 10 times farther Runes and now certain tiers adds more runes you can place
Tier 1 - can cast 2 runes
Tier 3 - can cast 4 runes
Tier 5 - can cast 9 runes
Tier 8 - can cast 13 runes
Tier 9 - can cast 25 runes

Extra Effect Perk add 8 new perk tiers to allow up to 10 enchantments when you enchant an item.
Now all Enchantments can be placed on any item.
author: lttlbckwolfe
